articles.title: Donald Trump warns Israeli strike on Iran could ‘very well happen’ - Financial Times
articles.description: US president ratchets up pressure on Tehran ahead of crunch talks on nuclear programme this weekend

articles.author: Christian Davenport
articles.title: NASA postpones launch while it investigates space station leaks - The Washington Post
articles.description: NASA said Thursday it was postponing a launch of private astronauts to the International Space Station while it works with its Russian counterparts to investigate persistent leaks on the orbiting laboratory.
articles.content: NASA said Thursday it was postponing a launch of private astronauts to the International Space Station while it works with its Russian counterparts to investigate persistent leaks on the orbiting lab… [+2431 chars]

articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: Chime almost died in 2016, turned down by 100 VCs. Today it IPO’d at $14.5B. - TechCrunch
articles.description: In 2016 when Chime desperately needed cash, over 100 VCs said no. One seed VC took a chance and saved the company, co-founder Ryan King recalls.
articles.content: One of the years most anticipated IPOs took place on Thursday when neobank Chime raised $864 million in its IPO, pricing its shares at $27, which is above its previously announced range of $24 to $26… [+3842 chars]

articles.author: Stef W. Kight
articles.title: Inside the Senate GOP's heated meeting with Stephen Miller - Axios
articles.description: The border has long been a top, unifying issue for Republicans. Now it's a point of drama.
articles.content:
• Paul was not physically in the room with Miller, but his presence was overwhelming.
  • Two sources described the meeting as heated and shared frustrations that Paul was using his power … [+1822 chars]
